name: strand-repeater
description: A component for duplicating a set of form fields from a template

experimental.message: This component contains experimental features. The configuration and API are subject to change. Please use at your own risk.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: An array containing key:value maps of the strand-repeater data, one per row

attributes.name: config
attributes.description: An configuration object used to provide validation rules and error messaging

attributes.name: addRowLabel
attributes.description: Custom text for adding a row

attributes.name: added
attributes.description: A read-only array of key:value maps of rows that have been added by the user

attributes.name: changed
attributes.description: A read-only array of key:value maps of rows that have been modified by the user

attributes.name: removed
attributes.description: A read-only array of key:value maps of rows that have been removed by the user

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validate the data in the repeater according to the rules provided in config. Returns a Boolean indicating whether all of the data is valid
